effect.name: Old Film Simulator
effect.description: Moves the picture up and down and adds random brightness changes
effect.author: Marco Gittler

parameter.name: delta
Maximum Up/Down Move
parameter.comment: Determines the maximum vertical movement in pixels

parameter.name: every
Frames With Movement
parameter.comment: Determines percentage of frames with vertical movement

parameter.name: brightnessdelta_up
Brightness Up
parameter.comment: Determines the value in brightness change up

parameter.name: brightnessdelta_down
Brightness Down
parameter.comment: Determines the value in brightness change down

parameter.name: brightnessdelta_every
Brightness Every
parameter.comment: Determines percentage of frames with brightness changes

parameter.name: unevendevelop_up
Uneven Develop Up
parameter.comment: Determines the value in lightness change up

parameter.name: unevendevelop_down
Uneven Develop Down
parameter.comment: Determines the value in lightness change down

parameter.name: unevendevelop_duration
Uneven Develop Duration
parameter.comment: Time (in frames) of an uneven development up/down cycle
